content:
OperationInfo Class

Definition

Represents the information for a contract operation defined in a workflow service.

In this Article

[System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated.  Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
public sealed class OperationInfo : System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase
Inheritance
Object
DependencyObject
OperationInfoBase
OperationInfo
Attributes
ObsoleteAttribute

Inherited Members

Site
UserData

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

The OperationInfo class is used to define service contract information for a ReceiveActivity activity.

Note

The OperationInfo class can be used only with a workflow-first service. For more information about workflow-first services, see Workflow Service Authoring Styles.

Constructors

OperationInfo()

Initializes a new instance of the OperationInfo class.

public OperationInfo ();
Attributes
ObsoleteAttribute

Remarks

When activities are deserialized from Xoml, the constructors for the associated properties are called automatically.

Properties

ContractName

Gets or sets the full name of the contract that defines this operation.

public string ContractName { get; set; }
Value
String

A string that represents the full name of the contract that defines the operation.

Attributes
ObsoleteAttribute

HasProtectionLevel

Gets information on whether or not the operation has a defined ProtectionLevel.

public bool HasProtectionLevel { get; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean value indicating whether or not the operation has a ProtectionLevel associated with it.

Attributes
DefaultValueAttribute

IsOneWay

Gets or sets information on the operation to specify that communication between the service and a client is one-way.

public bool IsOneWay { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the operation supports one-way communication; otherwise, false.

Attributes
DefaultValueAttribute

Remarks

The default value is false.

Parameters

Gets a collection of OperationParameterInfo objects that represents the parameter definitions used by the operation.

public System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfoCollection Parameters { get; }
Value
OperationParameterInfoCollection

A collection of OperationParameterInfo objects that represents the parameter definitions used by the operation when called by a client.

Attributes
DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute

Remarks

The Parameters collection will contain one element for each parameter in the method signature of the operation, plus one element for the return value of the operation.

ProtectionLevel

Gets or sets the ProtectionLevel of an operation.

public Nullable<System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> ProtectionLevel { get; set; }
Value
Nullable<ProtectionLevel>

A ProtectionLevel object used by the operation.

Attributes
DefaultValueAttribute

Remarks

The default value is null, which means that the protection level is not set.

Methods

Clone()

Creates a copy of the object.

public override System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase Clone ();
Returns
OperationInfoBase

The copy of the OperationInfo object.

Attributes
ObsoleteAttribute

Remarks

This method creates a deep copy of the OperationInfo object, with the same ContractName, IsOneWay, Parameters, and ProtectionLevel values.

Equals(Object)

Determines whether two object instances are equal.

public override bool Equals (object obj);
Parameters
obj
Object

The object to compare with the current OperationInfo.

Returns
Boolean

true to indicate that the current OperationInfo and obj are equal; otherwise, false.

Attributes
ObsoleteAttribute

Remarks

This operation compares the values of the ContractName, IsOneWay, Parameters, and ProtectionLevel values.
